events.message: The customer reported a car accident that happened yesterday involving their vehicle and another on a busy intersection.
The claim has been classified under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating vehicle collision and damage.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer with their recent vehicle accident claim.
The claim was formally acknowledged with a confirmation sent to the customer expressing understanding of their accident situation.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and the driver’s license to proceed with the accident claim investigation.
The customer submitted all the requested documentation including police report, photos, and insurance card promptly.
Investigation into the accident was initiated by the claims department to verify damages and liability based on provided evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming fault on the other driver’s part with validation of submitted damage reports and photos.
A fair settlement offer for the vehicle damages was proposed to the customer based on the investigation's findings.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and responsiveness of the claims handling process.
The claim was formally approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement amount.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to the customer’s account to cover vehicle repair costs.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully after final payment and customer confirmation of receipt.
All records and documentation related to the vehicle collision claim have been archived according to company policy.
